name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-northwind-inventory-ts
title: Northwind Inventory plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
shortDescription: This sample showcases a Teams message extension that serves as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot, enabling users to query the Northwind Database.
longDescription: This application implements a Teams message extension designed for Microsoft Copilot, allowing users to seamlessly query the Northwind Database. It features copilot handoff capabilities for transitioning to custom bot interactions within Teams.

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of the sample extension working in Copilot in Microsoft Teams

references.name: Extend Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
references.description: Learn more about how to extend Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365

references.name: Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code
references.description: Learn more about the Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
